document: RT @RadicalOrSlave: Are you repulsed by people who put their careers ahead of their community's wellbeing?

RT @WealthyFacts: If you consider yourself an entrepreneur, your chances of committing suicide immediately go up by 75%!
If you don't control your mind, someone else will. - John Allston
Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it. - Malcolm X
